scene.location: outdoor pool deck near a white building
scene.background: clear blue sky with green foliage on the left bright midday sun
scene.vibe: candid handheld nostalgic early-1990s consumer film

subject.description: athletic woman with tanned smooth skin beaded with water droplets wet hair loosely tied back
subject.wardrobe: white ribbed tank top black high-waisted swim shorts white Nike Air Force 1 sneakers
subject.pose: relaxed full-body slight hip pop one hand brushing hair other at side casual confident stance
subject.expression: playful cute and alluring direct gaze to camera

lighting.sun: hard midday sun enhancing color and fabric texture
lighting.flash: direct on-axis fill from built-in flash creating 90s snapshot look
lighting.notes: specular highlights on skin and water droplets slight shadow fall behind subject

color_grade.cast: slight warm shift with cyan in shadows typical of mini-lab prints
